title: Permasalahan pengajaran kosakata bahasa Tionghoa di sebuah SMA Surabaya
abstract: This study is acclomplished to reveal the teaching of Chinese vocabulary at a high school in Surabaya. Teaching Chinese nowadays is very needed and so it has been taught for years. However, about teaching problem and teaching method are not known well, especially teaching Chinese vocabulary. Language has four elements, vocabulary is one of them. Teaching chinese vocabulary has many kinds of methods which can improve teaching. The analysis technique used is descriptive qualitatif to describe the teaching of Chinese vocabulary problem. The result of the research showed that teaching of Chinese are working effectively but some theories of teaching Chinese vocabulary are not used.
contributors: Elisa Christiana (Examination Committee 1); Prof. Dra. Ester Harijanti Kuntjara, MA., Ph.D. (Advisor 1); Chang Hsin Ping B.A. (Advisor 2)
